data.name: ReadJailAddresses
data.value: select top(1) IDENTIFIER, STREET_1, STREET_2, CITY, [STATE], PROVINCE, POSTAL_CODE, ZIP_CODE5, ZIP_CODE4, ZIP_CODE3, COUNTRY, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, JAIL_NAME, PHONE, PHONE_AREA_CODE, PHONE_EXTENSION from CKT_JAIL_ADDR where IDENTIFIER = @identifier
